reviews.text: This was a business trip and the Hilton Garden Inn, Fairfield, CA provided a great location, excellent accomodations, and service. There is a mall and plenty of shops located within walking distance as well as many places to eat. We had a great meal at MiMi's Cafe just across the road - a short walk. My co-worker enjoyed the reasonably priced breakfast at the Hilton. Highly reccomend.
reviews.title: Positive experience

reviews.text: Keith and his crew should be commended for an excellent job they did on my daughters 18th birthday last Aug. 10,2013. Grace at the front desk should be commended as well for her professionalism and helpfulness.
reviews.title: Employees are excellent

reviews.text: We had a surprisingly wonderful stay for 2 nights at this well located chain hotel. On our way from Yosemite to Mendocino we decided to choose a chain hotel instead of staying in a pricey Inn, since we would not be meandering in wine country till the end of our travels. It was so perfect and about an hour outside of San Francisco that we decided to stay here for our last night before going to the airport. It was perfect. Large clean room, quiet, good shower water pressure and a nice breakfast for about $11.00. Staff were very polite. It was great and would highly recommend.
reviews.title: Excellent place outside of Napa.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They only caveat was that the air conditioner was noisy. We were lucky that it was quite cool outside so we did not have that much need for it.
reviews.title: Motel 6 quality at Hilton price
Nice Stay but some Strange Behavior by Hotel Management
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hilton Garden for 3 nights. During our stay, we had to ask for maid service (our room was not cleaned), the pool was out of towels and filthy and we waited at the bar for 10 minutes as the bar tender watched sports on tv. VERY poorly run hotel. The only redeeming quality is its location.

Typically very good Hilton Garden Inn that's a real benefit to business travelers, and at the usual good room rate. It's almost at the entrance to the famed Napa Valley wine and culinary culture. If you are OK with a drive to get there and back, this might be a way to save money to spend on wine and food instead. Nice staff, the usual HGI amenities (Hilton Honors a plus), and renovated recently enough ago. A big difference with this Hilton is that it's right on top of so many food and shopping choices, within walking distance. A big mall. Many chain restaurants of various levels all around. Very convenient. Even more choices just on the other side of the freeway, including grocery. Freeway close, so if you don't like the white noise, ask for a room on the non-freeway side. I expect to stay here again and do recommend it.
reviews.title: Another fine HGI, on top of many shops and a mall

reviews.text: We had a very nice stay at the Hilton Garden Inn-Fairfield. The meals were good, wedding recep. we went to there was very nice. All workers were very nice from front desk to dinning area and room helpers. Loved the location, everything was within walking distant. The only problem was the new style of handicape chair for the tubs. bad design.
reviews.title: good Hotel

reviews.text: We were in town for a wedding and had a great deal of family and friends staying at this hotel. The staff was great. Very friendly and helpful in arranging the rooms. We have stayed here before and choose this hotel over some that were closer to the wedding site because we had such a great experience the first time.
reviews.title: Wedding weekend

reviews.text: Great service each and every time. I enjoy the proximity to the local Panera Bread which sits right in front of the hotel. There are several other restaurants in the area as well, with really easy access to the interstate. I stay here whenever I'm in the area. Thank you and keep up the good work!
reviews.title: Awesome
Very good place to stay
reviews.text: Friendly and helpfull staff, this hotel is about twenty minus away from wine country, near the hotel you could see the Budweiser brewery and jelly belly candy factory. Comfortable and clean rooms, lot of restaurant to choose from within walking distance. Breakfast Buffett made to order at the hotel $ 11.95 not bad.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of this hotel was great for our needs. We only stayed here for two nights, but enjoyed how close it was to shopping, restaurants and wineries. The hotel itself was clean and the service was friendly. The restaurant provided good food at reasonable prices too.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We cannot say enough of our stay at the Hilton Garden Inn. The staff were so friendly and could not do enough for us celebrating our 52nd Anniversary and my birthday. The rooms were clean and spacious. The restaurant had the best food and we ate dinner there twice and breakfast each morning of our 4 day stay.
reviews.title: Hotel Review

reviews.text: I would recommend the Hilton Garden Inn in Fairfield (CA) to anyone needing a room in the area. The staff does a great job to make your stay complete and comfortable. The food is very good, and the bar service is excellent. There are also a number of restaurants within a short walk. This is a wonderful hotel for a reasonable price.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay

reviews.text: Nice clean hotel, centrally located. Close to the Jelly belly Factory, near 6 Flags, and the Bay Area. Room Amenities were good. I was happy with the overall feel of the hotel, staff were very friendly.
reviews.title: Nice Clean Hotel

reviews.text: Cashier lady at the restaurant was really really awesome and nice to my kids and I as we were getting breakfast. She is the only one that stood out in my opinion. The hotel was clean. I only stayed for 1 night, however, if needed to, I wouldn't mind staying there for another night. My family and I were just passing through. We came from El Dorado Hills and needed to travel to Napa the next morning.
reviews.title: A nice place to stay for a night

reviews.text: We stayed at the HGI Fairfield CA and we SO impressed with the staff and facility. Staff working in the restaurant for breakfast attended to all of our needs providing prompt service. The room was clean and updated. We could not ask for any better accommodations and service. We would give HGI Fairfield an A+ Thank you! The location is exceptional with many restaurants within walking distance as well as a mall. Panera Bread is right out the front door! The interstate is close by and it is a short distance to Napa Valley. We would definitely stay at this property again.
reviews.title: Outstanding Property!

reviews.text: check in clerk was indifferent at arrival. other Hiltons we visited during our trip, the employees were very friendly. as mentioned, didn't know breakfast was included like the other Hiltons, weren't told when we sat down of the charge, had a limited offering, was out of milk and other items, not nearly as well prepared as the embassy suites experiences. just a little disappointed.

This hotel was within 3 miles of where our 40th class reunion was to be held. We were not in our room much, but while we were in it, it was pleasant. We had 3 ladies in our room and we had plenty of room to move around to get ready for our night. The air conditioner worked very well, and I loved it.
reviews.title: 40th Class Reunion

reviews.text: There is usually something that everyone needs to improved upon at most properties where I have stayed on business trips. The HGI Fairfield CA was exceptional. All of the hotel staff were friendly & helpful. They literally bent over backwards to make my stay relaxing. Parking was excellent and there are many restaurants within a short walk. The mall is a short walk too. The breakfast staff were some of the hardest working individuals! I expect a lot out of my hotel properties when I travel. The HGI Fairfield get an A....
reviews.title: Exceptional Stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'm a Hilton Diamond member, and pretty fussy about my stays. Stayed here for the Sonoma races. Rooms clean, with adequate outlets. A/C worked! Beds were sleep #, so very comfy as were the pillows. Staff has a "can do" attitude. I had a few problems in the room, so filled out their request form (placed in the room -- great idea!) and upon return to our room both items were completely taken care of! Outstanding! Great server for our dinner -- I ordered Prime Rib (yum!) and hubs ordered French Dip. Drinks were tasty. Service very good! The 2 mornings we opted for breakfast. Lightning quick chef who prepared made to order egg dishes for hubs & I -- done to perfection. Attentive wait staff -- gliding around filling coffees and insuring all was ok. Two points: the rooms could use a facelift -- carpeting. And it's a bit awkward to find at first try -- really fooled the Garmin. It's in a Mall, behind a number of shops. Thanks, HGI!
reviews.title: Great location, easy off/on freeway and very good restaurant
